dialogue.htmlContent:
#VAR var kindEncounter = npc.hasPersonalityTrait(PERSONALITY_TRAIT_KIND); var playerEnforcer = pc.hasStatusEffect(SE_SET_ENFORCER); #ENDVAR

#IF(!game.isDayTime()) As you [pc.walk] down the dark alleyway, you suddenly see the light of an arcane-powered flash light shining out from around the next corner. #ELSE As you [pc.walk] down the narrow alleyway, you suddenly hear a pair of voices drawing louder from around the next corner. #ENDIF Preparing yourself for the worst, you get ready to defend yourself, but as you see that the two figures who step around the corner are Enforcers, you realise that this encounter might not involve any hostilities.

[npc.speech(Stop right there!)] the more senior of the two Enforcers calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you. Doing as the [npc.race] says, you wait while the pair of Enforcers quickly walk over to where you're standing.

#IF(playerEnforcer)

[npc.speech(I didn't see that you were one of us,)] the [npc.race] says, clearly seeing you as an Enforcer. Letting out a sigh, [npc.she] introduces [npc.herself] and [npc.her] colleague, [npc.speech(I'm [npc.name], and this here's [npc2.name]. I didn't think there were any other Enforcers assigned to patrol this area... If you've seen sign of any criminals nearby, then it'd be appreciated if you'd let us handle them; we're running behind on our quota this week...)]

#ELSE

[npc.speech(I'm [npc.name],)] the [npc.race] says, [npc.speech(and this here's [npc2.name].)]

#IF(pc.getRace()==RACE_DEMON) Clearly showing you a great deal more respect than [npc.she] would to a non-demon, [npc.name] explains, [npc.speech(I apologise for calling out for you to stop, [pc.miss], but we've heard reports of criminal activity in this area. We're obviously not accusing you of anything, but if you've seen any suspicious characters nearby, then details on their whereabouts would be much appreciated.)] #ELSEIF(pc.getRace()==RACE_HUMAN) #IF(kindEncounter) While [npc.she] clearly doesn't trust you to be on the right side of the law, [npc.name] tries to treat you in a kind manner as [npc.she] explains, [npc.speech(I'm sorry, [pc.miss], but we've heard reports of criminal activity in this area, and what with you being a human, we can't simply let you continue on your way without at least being searched. Please turn around and face the wall so that my colleague here can give you a pat-down.)] #ELSE Clearly not trusting you to be on the right side of the law, [npc.name] aggressively steps forwards and explains, [npc.speech(We've heard reports of criminal activity in this area, and what with you being a human, I'm betting that the one causing trouble is you, isn't it?! Turn around and face the wall so that my colleague here can give you a pat-down.)] #ENDIF #ELSEIF(!game.isDayTime()) #IF(kindEncounter) While [npc.she] clearly doesn't trust you to be on the right side of the law, [npc.name] tries to treat you in a kind manner as [npc.she] explains, [npc.speech(I'm sorry, [pc.miss], but we've heard reports of criminal activity in this area, and what with you being out here after sunset, we can't simply let you continue on your way without at least being searched. Please turn around and face the wall so that my colleague here can give you a pat-down.)] #ELSE Clearly not trusting you to be on the right side of the law, [npc.name] aggressively steps forwards and explains, [npc.speech(We've heard reports of criminal activity in this area, and what with you being out here after sunset, I'm betting that the one causing trouble is you, isn't it?! Turn around and face the wall so that my colleague here can give you a pat-down.)] #ENDIF #ELSE Stepping forwards, the [npc.race] Enforcer explains, [npc.speech(I apologise for calling out for you to stop, [pc.miss], but we've heard reports of criminal activity in this area. If you've seen any suspicious characters nearby, then details on their whereabouts would be much appreciated.)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF

Having already had sex with these Enforcers, there's nothing left for you to do except tell [npc.name] that you don't have any criminal activity to report. Straightening [npc.her] uniform, the [npc.race] flashes you a dirty smirk and bids you farewell, before setting off down the alleyway with [npc2.name] by [npc.her] side.

With the Enforcers having been dealt with, you continue on your journey...

Not wanting to waste any time dealing with these Enforcers, you tell [npc.name] that you don't have any criminal activity to report. Straightening [npc.her] uniform, the [npc.race] lets out a sigh and bids you farewell, before setting off down the alleyway with [npc2.name] by [npc.her] side.

With the Enforcers having been dealt with, you continue on your journey...

Wanting to have a little fun with these Enforcers, you step up close to [npc.name] and offer [npc.herHim] a flirty comment on how good [npc.she] looks in [npc.her] uniform.

[npc.speech([pc.Miss], please, we're on duty...)] [npc.name] hesitantly states, clearly unsure of how to react to a demon's sudden advances.

Not giving [npc.herHim] any time to think about what's happening, you lean forwards and press your [pc.lips+] against [npc.namePos] mouth. Much to your delight, you feel the [npc.race]'s hands start to grope your body as you passionately kiss [npc.herHim], and after a few moments of thrusting your [pc.tongue+] into [npc.her] mouth, you pull back and allow [npc.herHim] to take a deep breath.

[npc.speech(I suppose taking a short break wouldn't harm anyone... [npc2.Name], keep watch for any suspicious activity while I deal with this demon...)] [npc.name] says, making it clear that you're going to get to have some fun with this Enforcer...

Wanting to have a little fun with these Enforcers, you step up close to [npc.name] and offer [npc.herHim] a flirty comment on how good [npc.she] looks in [npc.her] uniform. Not wanting to leave [npc.her] partner out on your fun, you quickly sidestep over to [npc2.name] and seductively brush up against [npc2.herHim].

[npc.speech([pc.Miss], please, we're on duty...)] [npc.name] hesitantly states, clearly unsure of how to react to a demon's sudden advances.

Not giving [npc.herHim] any time to think about what's happening, you lean forwards and press your [pc.lips+] against [npc.namePos] mouth. As you give the [npc.race] a passionate kiss, you reach over to grab [npc2.namePos] tie, and after forcefully pulling [npc2.herHim] forwards, you move over to give [npc2.herHim] a taste of your [pc.lips].

[npc.speech(I suppose taking a short break wouldn't harm anyone,)] [npc.name] says, making it clear that you're going to get to have some fun with these two Enforcers...

Wanting to have a little fun with these Enforcers, you step up close to [npc.name] and offer [npc.herHim] a flirty comment on how good [npc.she] looks in [npc.her] uniform. Not wanting to be left out, your [pc.companion] quickly steps up beside you and seductively brushes up against [npc.name].

After a short while, your [com.companion] pulls back, letting [npc.name] pant, [npc.speech(I suppose taking a short break wouldn't harm anyone... [npc2.Name], keep watch for any suspicious activity while I deal with these two...)]

Wanting to have a little fun with these Enforcers, you step up close to [npc.name] and offer [npc.herHim] a flirty comment on how good [npc.she] looks in [npc.her] uniform. As you give the [npc.race] a passionate kiss, your [pc.companion] moves over to give [npc2.name] a taste of [com.her] lips. While [com.name] gets to work on making out with [npc2.name], you pull back and allow [npc.name] to take a deep breath.

[npc.speech(I suppose taking a short break wouldn't harm anyone,)] [npc.name] says, making it clear that you and [com.name] are going to get to have some fun with these two Enforcers...

#IF(pc.getRace()==RACE_HUMAN || (pc.getRace()!=RACE_DEMON && !game.isDayTime())) #IF(pc.hasCompanions()) Telling your [com.companion] to do as the Enforcers say, you turn around and face the wall, thereby submitting to a search via a pat-down. #ELSE Deciding that the best course of action is to just do as the Enforcers say, you turn around and face the wall, thereby submitting to a search via a pat-down. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF(pc.hasCompanions()) Not happy with the special treatment that you're getting, you turn around and face the wall, before looking back over your shoulder and demanding that [npc.name] subject you and [com.name] to the same sort of pat-down search as [npc.she]'d demand of others. Letting out a short sigh, the Enforcer agrees to do as you ask, and moves forwards to give you a search, while [npc2.name] does the same for your [com.companion]. #ELSE Not happy with the special treatment that you're getting, you turn around and face the wall, before looking back over your shoulder and demanding that [npc.name] subject you to the same sort of pat-down search as [npc.she]'d demand of others. Letting out a short sigh, the Enforcer agrees to do as you ask, and moves forwards to give you a search. #ENDIF #ENDIF

Moving forwards to stand right behind you, [npc.name] reaches up and starts patting you down. #IF(pc.hasBreasts()) Running [npc.her] [npc.hands] up and over your [pc.breasts+], [npc.she] lets out an amused grunt as [npc.she] gives them a firm squeeze. #ELSE Running [npc.her] [npc.hands] down over your ass, [npc.she] lets out an amused grunt as [npc.she] gives your cheeks a firm squeeze. #ENDIF Before you're able to react to react to this sexual harassment, [npc.name] asks, [npc.speech(You're hiding something, aren't you?)]

Reaching down between your [pc.legs], the Enforcer gives your groin a firm grope. With a big grin on [npc.her] face, [npc.she] demands, [npc.speech(Strip naked and put your hands up against the wall! I'm going to find out what it is that you're hiding!)]

Looking over to your [com.companion], you see [npc2.name] shamelessly groping [com.her] groin as [npc2.she] demands, [npc2.speech(You too!)]

Realising that submitting to the Enforcers' demands will undoubtedly lead into them fucking you and your [com.companion], you wonder if you should refuse to strip for them...

Quickly patting you down, [npc2.she] finds no evidence of any wrongdoing, and quickly steps back, leaving you to look across at what [npc.name] is doing to your [com.companion].

Reaching down between [com.namePos] [com.legs], [npc.name] is giving your [com.companion]'s groin a firm grope. With a big grin on [npc.her] face, [npc.she] demands, [npc.speech(Strip naked and put your hands up against the wall! I'm going to find out what it is that you're hiding!)]

Realising that letting [com.name] submit to this outrageous demand will undoubtedly lead into [npc.name] fucking [com.herHim], you wonder if you should stop this...

Quickly patting you down, [npc.name] finds no evidence of any wrongdoing. Stepping back, [npc.she] says that [npc.sheIs] satisfied that you're not concealing anything from [npc.herHim], before stating, [npc.speech(If you don't have any criminals to report, we'll be on our way.)]

[com.Name] strips off for [npc.name] and places [com.her] hands up against the wall, as instructed. [npc2.Name] orders you to remain facing the wall and watch.

[npc.Name] moves up close behind your [com.companion] and starts groping [com.herHim], before telling [com.herHim] that [npc.sheIs] going to give [com.herHim] a cavity search.

You tell [npc.name] that [npc.sheIs] not to dare make [com.name] strip naked. Stepping away from your [com.companion], [npc.name] smirks and relents, before asking if you have anything to report.

[npc.Name] and [npc2.name] have finished with you and [com.name].

Stepping back and smirking at the two of you, [npc.name] tells you both to get your clothes back on, then asks if you have anything to report.

[npc.Name] has finished [npc.her] search.

[npc.Name] has finished [npc.her] search.

Stepping back and smirking at your [com.companion], [npc.name] tells [com.name] to get [com.her] clothes back on, then asks if you have anything to report.
[npc.Name] finishes searching you. Comments on weapons but lets you go.

You transform eyes, ears, hair, horns, wings, to reveal that you're a demon. The Enforcers are worried at the fact that you were able to transform to fool them, commenting on how that's not something a normal demon can do.

You reveal that you are Lyssieth's child, which is enough to make the Enforcers apologise and ask if there's anything they can do for you.

You report the fact that [npc3.name] is lurking in this area.

Enforcers say that most of the criminals are repeat offenders, and they're most likely going to be enslaved for continuing to pursue a life of crime. They say that the criminal will be randomly auctioned off, but if you have a slaver license, it'd be quicker for them to let you enslave [npc3.herHim].

#IF(pc.isHasSlaverLicense()) As you do have a slaver license, you wonder whether you should help the Enforcers track down and enslave [npc3.name]... #ELSE As you don't have a slaver license, you let the Enforcers track down and enslave [npc3.name] by themselves... #ENDIF
You watch the Enforcers leave, confident in the fact that they'll catch and enslave [npc3.name]...
You help the Enforcers track down [npc3.name], and after fifteen minutes of searching, you find them.
As [npc3.sheIs] your child, [npc3.name] can't believe that you've betrayed them. They try to attack, but [npc2.name] stuns them and [npc.name] quickly moves in to arrest them.

As [npc3.she] considered you to be [npc3.her] friend, [npc3.name] can't believe that you've betrayed them. They try to attack, but [npc2.name] stuns them and [npc.name] quickly moves in to arrest them.
[npc3.Name] recognises you and says you'll pay for this. They try to attack, but [npc2.name] stuns them and [npc.name] quickly moves in to arrest them.
[npc.Name] gives you an enslavement collar and tells you to equip it on [npc3.name].

While [npc.name] holds [npc3.name] down, you clasp the collar around [npc3.her] neck...

[#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]

The Enforcers thank you for helping out, as they now don't need to fill in tedious enslavement paperwork. THey still need to file a report, however, and so quickly leave...
With the Enforcers gone, you continue on your way through the alleyways...

After a couple of hours, you're released. The Enforcer says that you're damn lucky to have Lilaya to vouch for you...
